meanings.definition: A round vegetable with many layers that has a strong taste and smell.
meanings.sent1: I chopped the onion for the soup.
meanings.sent2: The onion made me cry while cutting it.
meanings.sent3: Why did the onion make the salad cry? Because it was a tearjerker!
meanings.sent4: The layers of the onion peeled away like secrets revealed.
meanings.sent5: The pungent aroma of the onion filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A plant with a round bulb that is used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The onion bulb was plump and fresh.
meanings.sent2: She sautéed the onion with garlic for the pasta sauce.
meanings.sent3: Why did the onion go to the gym? To get a little more 'bulb'ous!
meanings.sent4: The onion bulb was a flavorful treasure waiting to be unlocked.
meanings.sent5: The onion bulb added a burst of flavor to the dish.
